actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs, and Office of Management and Budget.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the Chief Medical Director of the Department of Veterans Affairs as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Health Services and Research and to redesignate the Chief Benefits Director of that department as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Benefits.

summary.text: Redesignates: (1) the Chief Medical Director of the Department of Veterans Affairs as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Health Services and Research; and (2) the Chief Benefits Director of the Department as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Benefits.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Chief Medical Director of the Department of Veterans Affairs as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Health Services and Research and to redesignate the Chief Benefits Director of that department as the Under Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Benefits.
